name: @jointly/spyone
description: A simple script able to download any Git repository and extracts statistics from its commits, showing most touched files.

scripts.release:patch: npm run lint && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: linting' && git push && npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run lint && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: linting' && git push && npm version minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm run lint && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: linting' && git push && npm version major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish

author: Jointly <dev@jointly.pro>
